intro:
You awaken with a jolt. 
The acrid scent of smoke and the distant thud of explosions assaulting your senses. 
You find yourself in a mortar pit, surrounded by sandbags and the chaos of battle. 
The crackle of your radio pierces the air. 
Urgent voices relay requests for fire support. 
You grasp the radio, and a voice on the other end relays coordinates. 
Your comrades need your mortar fire to hold the enemy back. 
It seems your mortar tube, base plate, and ammo are scattered. 
You must locate and assemble your mortar to provide the much-needed support.
 The radio continues its relentless chatter. 
You look to your team for help. 
 
Press enter to continue
